lines.transliteration_english: kamatharee z sagaan gur gobindh singh |

Shabad OS A.translation: Nand Lal is aiming for the name of Guru Gobind Singh Ji (157)

Shabad OS A.translation: I am lower than the dogs of Guru Gobind Singh Ji

Shabad OS A.translation: I peck the small pieces in the dishes of Guru Gobind Singh Ji (158)
